title: How to Download and Install Mods for Terraria on PC

steps.headline: Open Steam.
steps.description: Type in Terraria in the search bar then click the Terraria tab.

steps.headline: Add the game to your cart.
Go to the Library tab.
steps.description: Once you are in your game library, click Terraria. Once you click Terraria click Install.

steps.headline: Click the Install under drop-down and select the drive you want the game files to be in.
Go to the tModLoader download page.
steps.description: Scroll down until you see Download, and then click the operating system you use.

steps.headline: Save the .zip file to your desktop.
Open your Terraria folder.
steps.description: By default, its location is C:\ProgramFiles\Steam\Steamapps\common\Terraria. It is very important for you to create a copy of the Terraria.exe file.

steps.headline: Copy and paste the files from the "tmodloader" zip file that was downloaded into the Terraria folder.
steps.description: When asked to replace or skip a file make sure you click Replace.

steps.headline: Verify it worked.
steps.description: You will know it worked when you launch the game and it says "tModLoader" in the bottom left corner.

steps.headline: Find some mods you are interested in and click download.
Go to the main menu and click the Mods button.
Go back to the main menu and start playing.

text: Installing the Game Open Steam. Type in Terraria in the search bar then click the Terraria tab. Add the game to your cart.  Proceed with the checkout.  Go to the Library tab. Once you are in your game library, click Terraria. Once you click Terraria click Install. Click the Install under drop-down and select the drive you want the game files to be in. Then hit Next. Click Finish. Installing tModLoader Go to the tModLoader download page. Scroll down until you see Download, and then click the operating system you use. Save the .zip file to your desktop.  Open your Terraria folder. By default, its location is C:\ProgramFiles\Steam\Steamapps\common\Terraria. It is very important for you to create a copy of the Terraria.exe file. Copy and paste the files from the "tmodloader" zip file that was downloaded into the Terraria folder. When asked to replace or skip a file make sure you click Replace. Next double click Terraria.exe.  Verify it worked. You will know it worked when you launch the game and it says "tModLoader" in the bottom left corner. Downloading Mods Click the Mod Browser button.  Find some mods you are interested in and click download.  Go to the main menu and click the Mods button.  Click Enable All. Then click Reload Mods. Go back to the main menu and start playing.
